sentences.english: Most Dongxiang minority people live in Gansu Province in China.
sentences.chinese: 東鄉族主要居住在中國的甘肅省。

sentences.english: Dongxiang dialect is one of Mongolian language family in Altaic.
sentences.chinese: 東鄉語是阿爾泰語系蒙古親屬語言之一。

sentences.english: Doing excellent work, they were praised as "Dongxiang invincible army".
sentences.chinese: 由於其傑出的工作，他們被譽爲“東鄉鐵軍”。

sentences.english: A ethnic group of China, mainly living in Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 東鄉族主要居住在中國的甘肅省。

sentences.english: Dongxiang language has borrowed a lot of Chinese words.
sentences.chinese: 東鄉語借入了大量的漢語詞。
